mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_CODE, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_TEL, PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_STATUS, MEMBER_FLAG, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_STATUS = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "MEMBER" VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, DEFAULT, #{memberId}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberName}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberPw}, #{memberTel}, '/images/user.png', DEFAULT, DEFAULT, 0 )

INSERT INTO "STORE" VALUES( #{storeNo}, #{storeName}, NULL, #{storeLocation}, DEFAULT, NULL, #{storeTel}, #{openHour}, #{closeHour}, NULL, NULL, DEFAULT, '/images/storeDetail/store.jpg', 0, #{memberNo}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_STATUS = 'N' AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "STORE" WHERE STORE_CLOSED = 'N' AND STORE_NO = #{storeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE "AUTH_KEY" SET AUTH_KEY = #{authKey}, CREATE_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE TEL_NUMBER=#{memberTel}
